name: Association Française des Entreprises Privées / French Association of Large Companies
goal: L’Afep a pour objectif de contribuer à l’élaboration d’un environnement favorable au développement de l’activité économique et de porter la vision des entreprises qui la composent auprès des pouvoirs publics français, des institutions européennes et des organisations internationales.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
- financial market regulation: FTT, capital markets union, prospectus, EMIR, European Supervision Agencies
- company law, corporate governance, CSR: shareholder rights directive, market abuse regulation, gender balance on boards, non-financial reporting
- climate change, energy, environment: international negotiations on climate change, ETS, non-ETS, clean energy package, circular economy, industrial emissions, environmental liability
- competition: merger control, powers of the national competition authorities
- intellectual property: IPRED, e-commerce
- digital single market: data protection, free flow of data, privacy shield
- taxation: BEPS, code of conduct (patent boxes, non-cooperative jurisdictions), CCTB/CCCTB, anti-tax avoidance directives, CBCR, DTDR
- trade: China MES, anti-dumping, ISDS, Multilateral Investment Court, Brexit negotiations
